lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Justine Henin reached the final of the Diamond Games, rallying to beat the Swiss qualifier Timea Bacsinszky, 2-6, 6-3, 6-3, in Antwerp, Belgium. Henin will play Karin Knapp of Italy.
snippet: Top-ranked Justine Henin reached the final of the Diamond Games, rallying to beat the Swiss qualifier Timea Bacsinszky, 2-6, 6-3, 6-3, in Antwerp, Belgium. Henin will play Karin Knapp of Italy.
